def_cn: 盎格鲁—撒克逊族裔的白人新教徒（指社会上拥有强大权力和影响力的白人）
def_en: WASP is used to refer to the people in American society whose ancestors came from northern Europe, especially England, and who are considered to have a lot of power and influence. WASP is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'White Anglo-Saxon Protestant'.
A wasp is an insect with wings and yellow and black stripes across its body. Wasps have a painful sting like a bee but do not produce honey.
